mainPage.title: Easily initiate from AI-based process management to execution.
mainPage.subTitle: Process definition, organizational chart management, To-Do management, process execution, process monitoring, process analysis.

processExecution.title: Process Execution
processExecution.processDefinitionExplanation:
Execute the process interactively. For example, you can issue commands like: 
'I'd like to apply for a vacation:
 1. Reason: Personal matter
 2. Start date of leave: Today
 3. Return date from leave: Friday'
processExecution.agent: Use the Agent feature to draft your proposal.

organizationChartDefinition.title: Org Chart Setup
organizationChartDefinition.organizationChartExplanation:
Manage the organization chart interactively.
You can register, modify, and delete teams (departments), roles, and employees.
For example, you can issue commands like: 'Register the development and management teams, and add Mr. Hong Gil-dong as a new employee to the management team. His role is a developer. The team leader of the management team is Team Leader Amuge.'

processDefinitionMap.title: Process Definition Map
processDefinitionMap.lock: Please press the lock to lock it in order to check in (save).
processDefinitionMap.unlock: Please press the lock to unlock it in order to check out (edit).

uiDefinition.title: Screen Definition
uiDefinition.uiDefinitionExplanation:
Manage screens interactively.
 For example, you can issue commands like 'I want to create a form to receive user information. The user information should include username, email, gender, and user profile image.'
uiDefinition.deleteFormMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the form?

processDefinition.title: Process Definition
processDefinition.processDefinitionExplanation:
Manage the process interactively. For example, you can issue commands like: 
'Register the sales management process as follows:
1. Register sales opportunities including customer name, estimated business size, key person, requirements
2. Proposal preparation: proposal contents, pricing
3. Winning or losing an order
4. If the order is won, proceed with contract execution'
processDefinition.name: Name
processDefinition.deleteProcessMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this process?

chat.lock: Please press the lock to lock it in order to check in (save).
chat.unlock: Please press the lock to unlock it in order to check out (edit).

accountTab.selectImageExplanation: JPG, GIF, or PNG allowed. Max size 800K
accountTab.changePasswordExplanation: To change your password, confirm here.
accountTab.personalDetailsExplanation: To modify and save your personal details, edit here.
accountTab.name: Name

tenantManagePage.title: Company Management
tenantManagePage.subTitle1: Create a new company or go to a page managed by the selected company.
tenantManagePage.subTitle2: (* Sign-up is not possible on mobile devices.)

tenantInfoField.step1-text:
(*The password must contain all of these : Uppercase and Lowercase letters, Number and Special characters.)
1. Go to the Supabase registration pageand create an account.
tenantInfoField.step2-1: STEP 2. Create a Project or Organization
tenantInfoField.step2-1-text:
1. Select “New Project” or “New Organization” from the page after creating an account.
2. Click “New Project”.
tenantInfoField.step2-2-text:
(*If you already have an organization, skip this step.)
1. Enter the name of the new organization you want to create in the “Name” field.
2. Click “Create organization” button.
tenantInfoField.step2-3-text:
1. Select “organization” and enter the name of the project you want to create in “Project name” field.
2. Enter the password of the database that you will use.
(*Paste the password you entered into the “Database Password” field below.
3. Select “Seoul” for the “Region” as the screenshot above.
4. Click “Create new project” button.
tenantInfoField.step3-1-text:
1. If the project creation is done, click the gear icon at the bottom left.
2. Select “API Menu” from the menu list of “Settings”.
3. (*Copy the URL from “Project URL” section and paste it into the box below.)
tenantInfoField.step3-2-text:
1. You can check the “Secret Key” by clicking the “Reveal” button from the “Project API Keys” section.
(*Copy the “Secret Key” and paste it into the box below.”
tenantInfoField.step3-3-text:
1. Select “Database” from the menu list of “Settings”.
2. Copy “Host”, “Database name”, “Port”, “User” from the “Connection parameters” section and paste it into the each box below.
tenantInfoField.step4: STEP 4. Enter the Company Name to Use
tenantInfoField.step4-text:
1. Enter the name of the company in the box below and click “Create” button to create a company.
The name of the company will be used as a sub-domain.
e.g. {Company Name}.process-gpt.io
tenantInfoField.step5: STEP 5. Setting up Supabase Site URL
tenantInfoField.step5-text:
1. Select lock icon(Authentication) from the left menu.
2. Click “URL Configuration”.
3. Click copy button to copy the “Site URL” including the company name you entered from Step4 and paste it into the “Site URL” box.
4. Click “Save” button.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.sendEmailExplanation: Please enter the email address associated with your account and We will email you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.passwordExplanation: Enter the password you want to reset.

BpmnPropertyPanel.name: Name
BpmnPropertyPanel.mapperDescriptionTitle: Data mapping is a function that passes variables to the next task
BpmnPropertyPanel.mapperDescriptionSubTitle1:
1. Variables: Values added to the variable section 
2. Roles: Roles (names) registered in the swimlane 
3. Instance: Stores the end date of the next task to be executed 
4. Activities: Roles (names) registered in the task 
5. Arguments: Names (values) registered in the attributes
BpmnPropertyPanel.mapperDescriptionSubTitle2:
How to use 
- Drag and drop while holding the mouse to connect
- Click the line to delete

Mashup.hoverText: Drag a layout (Container) here to start editing the form.

ReceiveTaskPanel.skipIfNotFound: Skip if not found (404 error handling)
ReceiveTaskPanel.title: Title

ServiceTaskPanel.methodTypeDescriptionTitle: Set the method (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH) to use when sending an API request and the server's endpoint URL to process the request.
ServiceTaskPanel.methodTypeDescriptionSubTitle1:
1. GET: A request to retrieve data from the server 
2. POST: A request to create and send new data to the server 
3. PUT: A request to update or replace existing data entirely 
4. PATCH: A request to partially modify existing data 
5. API URL: The endpoint URL of the server where the request will be sent

EventSynchronizationForm.name: Name
EventSynchronizationForm.typeDescriptionTitle: Attribute: Defines the data to be stored for the corresponding item
EventSynchronizationForm.typeDescriptionSubTitle1:
1. Unique Key: A key that uniquely identifies each record and does not allow duplicates within the database. 
2. Correlation Key: A key used to establish and track relationships between different data, maintaining data correlations.

UserTaskPanel.formCreateDialog: Do you want to create a form?
UserTaskPanel.radioSelectDescriptionTitle: Select data processing method: Basic data processing, Custom screen creation, External system integration.
UserTaskPanel.radioSelectDescriptionSubTitle1:
1. Basic: Use basic data 
2. Form: Screen created in screen definition 
3. External Application: Generates a field for entering a business screen URL

SubProcessPanel.role: Create multiple sub-processes based on roles
SubProcessPanel.variable: Create multiple sub-processes based on variables

SendTaskPanel.return: Variable to store the return value
SendTaskPanel.methodTypeDescriptionTitle: Set the method (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH) to use when sending an API request and the server's endpoint URL to process the request.
SendTaskPanel.methodTypeDescriptionSubTitle1:
1.GET: A request to retrieve data from the server 
2.POST: A request to create and send new data to the server 
3.PUT: A request to update or replace existing data entirely 
4.PATCH: A request to partially modify existing data 
5.API URL: The endpoint URL of the server where the request will be sent
SendTaskPanel.returnTitle:
The dropdown menu displays a list of variable names registered in the process variables. 
Users can select the desired variable from this list.
